BG3 Moonlight Glaive Information

Moonlight Glaive: Glowing: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m. Moonlight Strike: Strike a foe, conjuring an illusory swarm of moon-pale butterflies, granting Advantage on attacks against the target. Range: 2.5m
